eligibility: Small and marginal farmer families with cultivable land up to 2 hectares.
benefits: ₹6,000 per year paid in three equal instalments.
description: Income support scheme for farmers to supplement their financial needs.

ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
eligibility: Families without pucca houses meeting income criteria under EWS/LIG categories.
benefits: Interest subsidy on home loans and credit-linked subsidies for house construction.
description: Assists beneficiaries with affordable housing and interest subsidies.

schemeName: Ayushman Bharat - Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PM-JAY)
ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
eligibility: Based on SECC/eligibility criteria; economically vulnerable families.
benefits: Health coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care.
description: Health insurance scheme providing cashless hospitalization for eligible families.

eligibility: Any Indian citizen without a bank account.
benefits: Basic banking account, overdraft facility, RuPay debit card, accidental insurance cover.
description: Universal access to banking facilities for financial inclusion.

schemeName: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.
benefits: Guaranteed 100 days of wage employment per household per year (as per norms).
description: Provides social security by guaranteeing wage employment in rural areas.

ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development
eligibility: General public; focuses on areas with low child sex ratio.
benefits: Awareness campaigns, incentives and scheme support for girl child education and welfare.
description: Aims to address declining child sex ratio and promote education of the girl child.

schemeName: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
eligibility: Rural youth between ages as per program guidelines.
benefits: Skill training and placement support for rural youth.
description: Skilling and placement program for rural youth to enable livelihood opportunities.

eligibility: SC/ST or Women entrepreneurs setting up enterprises with loan amount between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore.
benefits: Bank loans with support and credit facilitation for setting up businesses.
description: Promotes entrepreneurship among women and SC/ST communities through bank loans.

eligibility: Non-corporate small business owners, micro enterprises.
benefits: Loans up to ₹10 lakh under Shishu/Kishor/Tarun categories without collateral.
description: Provides collateral-free loans to small and micro enterprises.

ministry: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
eligibility: Individual, self-help groups, society and entrepreneurs meeting scheme conditions.
benefits: Subsidized capital for starting micro-enterprises.
description: Generates employment through establishment of micro-enterprises with government subsidy.

eligibility: Agricultural landholders registered under the state's beneficiary list.
benefits: Financial assistance to farmers for cultivation needs (state-specific amount).
description: State-level farmer support scheme providing direct financial assistance to farmers.

eligibility: Women in the specified age group and belonging to eligible social categories as per state rules.
benefits: Direct financial assistance spread over multiple years for women beneficiaries.
description: Financial assistance program for women empowerment in Andhra Pradesh.

eligibility: Below poverty line and eligible families in the state enrollment list.
benefits: Cashless hospitalization and tertiary healthcare for eligible families.
description: State health insurance scheme providing coverage for major medical treatments.

eligibility: Students meeting scheme-specific academic and income criteria.
benefits: Scholarships for students across various categories and levels of education.
description: Single-window portal for scholarship schemes provided by central and state governments.

ministry: Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas
eligibility: Women from Below Poverty Line households without LPG connections.
benefits: Provision of LPG connections with financial support for deposit and equipment.
description: Provides clean cooking fuel to women from economically weaker sections.

eligibility: Workers in the unorganized sector aged 18-40 (joiners) with a savings account.
benefits: Guaranteed minimum pension on attaining retirement age based on contributions.
description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers with fixed pension benefits.

ministry: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
eligibility: Indian youth interested in skill training and certification.
benefits: Short-term skill training and certification with placement assistance.
description: Provides skill development training to increase employability of youth.

ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
eligibility: Residents of rural areas seeking primary and preventive healthcare services.
benefits: Support for rural health infrastructure and services (ASHA workers, primary care).
description: Provides comprehensive healthcare services focusing on rural populations.

eligibility: Parent/guardian of a girl child below a specified age.
benefits: High interest savings account for girl child with tax benefits.
description: Encourages parents to save for the education and marriage of their girl child.

eligibility: Unorganized workers between ages 18-40 with income below specified limit.
benefits: Minimum assured pension post-retirement based on contributions.
description: Pension scheme to provide social security to unorganized workers.

eligibility: Students meeting scholarship-specific academic and income criteria.
benefits: Scholarships for various levels of education (central/state-wise).
description: Central scholarship programs to support students from economically weaker backgrounds.

ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs / Ministry of Jal Shakti
eligibility: Households requiring sanitation support and toilet construction assistance.
benefits: Support for construction of household toilets and community sanitation projects.
description: Mission to eliminate open defecation and improve solid waste management.

eligibility: BPL households meeting age or disability criteria as per scheme rules.
benefits: Pensions and financial assistance to eligible elderly, widows, and disabled persons.
description: Provides social assistance to vulnerable population groups.

eligibility: Farmers insuring eligible crops under notified season and area.
benefits: Crop insurance coverage against yield loss due to natural calamities.
description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop failures.

ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
eligibility: Urban poor households and members of self-help groups.
benefits: Skill training, micro-enterprise support and credit linkage.
description: Improves livelihoods for the urban poor through skill training and financial inclusion.

ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution
eligibility: Households listed under NFSA/eligibility criteria for subsidized grains.
benefits: Access to subsidized food grains through ration cards.
description: Ensures food security and subsidized food grain distribution to eligible families.

schemeName: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP) - alternate
ministry: Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
eligibility: Individuals and groups meeting scheme criteria for subsidies.
benefits: Financial assistance and subsidy for establishing micro enterprises.
description: Supports setting up of new micro enterprises through subsidies.

eligibility: Villages and habitations identified for rural road connectivity.
benefits: Construction of all-weather roads to connect rural areas to markets and services.
description: Improves rural connectivity through construction of roads.

eligibility: Agri-food businesses and farmers involved in processing and value addition.
benefits: Support for food processing infrastructure, cold chain, and value chain development.
description: Promotes investment and infrastructure in food processing sector.

ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
eligibility: All residents seeking primary and maternal healthcare services.
benefits: Maternal and child health programs, immunization, primary healthcare services.
description: Comprehensive health mission providing essential health services across the country.

eligibility: Pregnant and lactating mothers, children under 6, and adolescent girls.
benefits: Supplementary nutrition, early education, and healthcare services.
description: Provides essential services for child development and maternal welfare.

eligibility: Parent/guardian of a girl child below a specified age.
benefits: High interest savings account for girl child with tax benefits.
description: Encourages parents to save for the education and marriage of their girl child.

eligibility: Farmers insuring eligible crops under notified season and area.
benefits: Crop insurance coverage against yield loss due to natural calamities.
description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop failures.
